summary: This document is an email chain from October 10, 2019, among legal team members coordinating the scheduling of victim interviews for October 22-24, 2019, in relation to the Epstein case. It involves attorneys from Edwards Pottinger LLC.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the initial email in the chain, coordinating the scheduling of victim interviews for October 23 & 24, 2019, and is identified as a Trial Attorney at Edwards Pottinger LLC.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (Cc'd) on the initial email from Brittany Henderson regarding the scheduling of Epstein victim interviews.

persons.name: Sigrid
persons.context: Mentioned in a forwarded email as having 2 to 3 individuals who would like to be interviewed on October 22 and 23, 2019.

connections.description: Both are part of the legal team (Edwards Pottinger LLC) coordinating victim interviews for the Epstein case, as indicated by Brittany Henderson copying Brad Edwards on the scheduling email.

events.title: Scheduled Victim Interviews
events.description: A date mentioned for conducting victim interviews, with one attorney stating they are 'wide open' on this day and Sigrid mentioning 2-3 individuals wanting to be interviewed.

events.title: Scheduled Victim Interviews
events.description: A primary date scheduled for victim interviews, with multiple attorneys coordinating availability. One attorney is available after 2pm, and Sigrid has individuals for this day.

events.title: Scheduled Victim Interviews
events.description: Another date scheduled for victim interviews, with one attorney available all day and another available until noon. The morning is noted as working best for one individual.

keyFacts: Legal team members from Edwards Pottinger LLC were actively scheduling victim interviews for the Epstein case in October 2019.
The interviews were planned for specific dates: October 22, 23, and 24, 2019.
An individual named Sigrid was coordinating for 2 to 3 people who wished to be interviewed on October 22 and 23.
The email chain demonstrates logistical coordination among attorneys (Brittany Henderson, Brad Edwards) and associates for taking victim testimony.
